REST API contacts Repository¶

async src.contacts.repository.create_contact(body: ContactSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
async src.contacts.repository.delete_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
async src.contacts.repository.find_contacts(query: str, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
async src.contacts.repository.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
async src.contacts.repository.get_contacts(limit: int, offset: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

The get_contacts function returns a list of todos for the user.

Parameters:

  • limit – int: Limit the number of contacts returned

  • offset – int: Skip the first n results

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass a database connection to the function

  • user – User: Filter the contacts by user

Returns:

A list of contact objects

Doc-author:

handmade

async src.contacts.repository.upcoming_birthday(db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
async src.contacts.repository.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶
